# animationDuration()

**Type Method**

Returns the animation duration used by all animations within this transaction group.

## Declaration

```swift
class func animationDuration() -> CFTimeInterval
```

## Return Value

An interval of time used as the duration.

## Discussion

You can retrieve the animation duration for a specific transaction by calling the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransaction/value(forKey:)] method of the transaction object and asking for the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/kCATransactionAnimationDuration] key.

## Overriding Animation Duration and Timing

- **setAnimationDuration(_:)**: Sets the animation duration used by all animations within this transaction group.
- **animationTimingFunction()**: Returns the timing function used for all animations within this transaction group.
- **setAnimationTimingFunction(_:)**: Sets the timing function used for all animations within this transaction group.
